TopicTitle: Bugtracker issue: version 1.1.1 option not available yet for new bug reports

Articles.Content:
Maybe I just need to wait a while, but anyway, just letting you guys know that the 1.1.1 version isn't available on the dropdown for a new bug report.

I'm still investigating and researching the one that I'm looking at which is new in 1.1.1, so, no hurry on my part.
Thanks smjjames, how does it look now?

Semi-related:

Why was there a sub-forum that took people to the bugtracker directly for pre-release, but not generally in the support area? Meanwhile, the pre-release forums are still there... 

Since bug reports in the forums are supposedly not really looked at, shouldn't there be a link like there was for pre-release?

2 hours ago, tater said:

Semi-related:

Why was there a sub-forum that took people to the bugtracker directly for pre-release, but not generally in the support area? Meanwhile, the pre-release forums are still there... 

Since bug reports in the forums are supposedly not really looked at, shouldn't there be a link like there was for pre-release?

A link to the bugtracker, thats easy to find, would make sense... The Stock-support-bug-reporting-guide has a link, but its at the end of the second post.

Yeah, just a couple weeks ago, there was a "forum" in the pre-release branch that just took you there.

Edited April 29, 2016 by tater
